tasks.label: Generate ANTLR and Compile Java
args: java -Xmx500m -cp lib/antlr-4.13.1-complete.jar org.antlr.v4.Tool -Dlanguage=Java -visitor -o src/antlr src/grammar/Grammar.g4 && javac -d output -cp lib/antlr-4.13.1-complete.jar src/antlr/*.java src/Main.java src/exception/*.java src/interpreter/*.java
